content: I am waiting for an market exchange to go through, and it may take too long to collateralize my trade position.I am willing to send 120% in ETH Upfront to anyone, as long as they are very reputable I need $5000 USDC Arbitrum to an ethereum addressOnce my exchange goes through, I'll send you back $5250 on Arbitrum USDCEdit: No longer need, exchange went through
